metadata.title: NOAA/CMDL Ocean/Atmosphere Exchange of Trace Compounds 1992 (OAXTC)
metadata.description: The main goal of the study was to determine the atmospheric mixing ratio of hydrochlorofluorocarbon (HCFC-22) and its partial pressure in surface waters of the West Pacific Ocean to assess the possible existence of an oceanic sink for this compound.  The OAXTC study was funded by the Alternative Fluorocarbon Environmental Acceptability Study (AFEAS) and the Atmospheric Chemistry Project of NOAA's Climate and Global Change Program.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: The main goal of the study was to determine the atmospheric mixing ratio of hydrochlorofluorocarbon (HCFC-22) and its partial pressure in surface waters of the West Pacific Ocean to assess the possible existence of an oceanic sink for this compound.  The OAXTC study was funded by the Alternative Fluorocarbon Environmental Acceptability Study (AFEAS) and the Atmospheric Chemistry Project of NOAA's Climate and Global Change Program.
